title: Pattern of Britain: north east corner
creator_credit: John Eldridge, Ralph Keene and Green Park Productions
brief_description: A study of the communities in the extreme north-west area of Scotland, which, once dependent on fishing for their livelihood, are today becoming increasingly dependent on agriculture. Features the area’s main city of Aberdeen. The story is told by an old fisherman.
creator_credit_for_label: John Eldridge, Ralph Keene and Green Park Productions
